description: This file contains styles for a Tic Tac Toe game's frontend, including color definitions, typography settings, and common layout styles.

classes.name: container
classes.description: A layout container with maximum width and centered alignment.

classes.name: shadow-1
classes.description: A shadow effect class providing a subtle shadow to elements.

classes.name: shadow-2
classes.description: A shadow effect class with a stronger shadow impact.

classes.name: shadow-3
classes.description: A moderate shadow effect class to give depth to elements.

classes.name: shadow-4
classes.description: A robust shadow effect class intended for prominent elements.

classes.name: border-radius-20
classes.description: A class to apply a border radius of 20 pixels.

classes.name: border-radius-35
classes.description: A class to apply a border radius of 35 pixels.
